mapper.select: SELECT no, id, email, password, name, nickname, loc FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY no DESC) rn, no, id, email, password, name, nickname, loc FROM member WHERE manager = 1) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{pageNo} -1) * #{amount} + 1 AND #{pageNo} * #{amount}
SELECT no, id, email, password, name, nickname, loc, manager FROM member WHERE no = #{no}
SELECT count(*) FROM member WHERE manager = 1
mapper.update: update member set manager = 1 WHERE no = #{no}
update member set manager = 0 WHERE no = #{no}
